intro: Pop bubbles, play mini-games & build a cozy cat village in a Japanese carnival adventure!
description:
A charming bubble-popping adventure at a cozy Japanese carnival – perfect for Nintendo Switch™!

Welcome to Kimono Cats, a delightful journey through vibrant festival streets inspired by old Japan! Together with your adorable cat companions, you'll explore festive landscapes, popping bubbles, playing lively carnival mini-games, and creating your dream village.


Key Features:
- Bubble-Popping Fun - Pop and collect surprises from over 112 unique bubble types across 18 charming levels.
- Mini-Games Galore - Try your skills at 18 festival-inspired mini-games, including goldfish scooping, ball toss, music rhythm challenges, and more!
- Village Customization - Build and personalize your own unique village with over 227 collectible items, including houses, stores, plants, terrain, and delightful decorations.  
- Friendly & Positive Community - Connect with friends, exchange gifts, and visit each other's villages. No raids or competition –just good vibes and creativity!
- Adorable Cat Companions - Select from 26 lovable cat avatars, dress them in 22 unlockable outfits, and enjoy heartwarming animations and interactions.
- Accessible Gameplay - Easy-to-learn controls and short, rewarding play sessions make Kimono Cats ideal for both casual gaming and longer relaxation sessions on your Nintendo Switch™.


Whether you’re a dedicated collector, a casual player seeking cozy fun, or just love adorable cats – Kimono Cats is ready to whisk you away to a charming festival filled with joy, friendship, and endless surprises!

Join the festival, create your village, and pop your way to happiness on Nintendo Switch™!
